Text: I take it as this is the same as the others, just smaller? or has anything been done to it?
decent 6A and 6V with occasional out of focus issues you can hear clearly though. thanks to the uploader

IMO, its un-watchable. constant noise in the background and the camera seems to lose focus during any quick movement. so for an action flick, a lot. i didn't finish watching it so i can't say the entire movie is like this. i appreciate the uploader upping this, sorry to dislike it. :(
Sry, unwatchable for me - primarily the audio.
